
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.


get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_protoc_bin
  TOOL_protoc_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/bin
  protoc
)
get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_bin
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/plugins/cpp_styleguide
  cpp_styleguide
)
get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_protoc_bin
  TOOL_protoc_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/bin
  protoc
)
get_built_tool_path(
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_bin
  TOOL_cpp_styleguide_dependency
  contrib/tools/protoc/plugins/cpp_styleguide
  cpp_styleguide
)

add_library(server-lib-hydra)
target_compile_options(server-lib-hydra PRIVATE
  -Wdeprecated-this-capture
)
target_include_directories(server-lib-hydra PUBLIC
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
)
target_link_libraries(server-lib-hydra PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-linux-headers
  #contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  yt-library-process
  yt-yt-ytlib
  server-lib-election
  server-lib-hydra_common
  server-lib-io
  server-lib-misc
  contrib-libs-protobuf
)
target_proto_messages(server-lib-hydra PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/hydra/proto/hydra_service.proto
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/hydra/proto/snapshot_service.proto
)
target_sources(server-lib-hydra PRIVATE
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/hydra/changelog_discovery.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/hydra/changelog_download.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/hydra/checkpointer.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/hydra/decorated_automaton.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/hydra/distributed_hydra_manager.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/hydra/lease_tracker.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/hydra/local_snapshot_service.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/hydra/mutation_committer.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/hydra/recovery.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/hydra/snapshot_discovery.cpp
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt/yt/server/lib/hydra/snapshot_download.cpp
)
target_proto_addincls(server-lib-hydra
  ./yt
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
  ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus
  ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ytsaurus/contrib/libs/protobuf/src
)
target_proto_outs(server-lib-hydra
  --cpp_out=${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
  --cpp_styleguide_out=${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/ytsaurus/yt
)
